# portraitUpsideDown

**Type Property**

The device is in portrait mode, but is upside down.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor static var portraitUpsideDown: PreviewTrait<Preview.ViewTraits> { get }
```

## Discussion

This is the same as [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/SwiftUI/InterfaceOrientation/portraitUpsideDown].
